Uses: HIV-1 maintenance therapy (in combination with rilpivirine)

Side Effects (common): Nausea, facial flushing, injection site pain

Uses: Treatment of hypocalcemia and renal osteodystrophy
Management of hyperphosphatemia in chronic kidney disease
IV treatment of hypocalcemia and cardiac resuscitation
Treatment of type 2 diabetes mellitus (SGLT2 inhibitor)
Management of hypertension and heart failure
Treatment of breast and colorectal cancers (antineoplastic; prodrug of 5-FU)
